typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ExtLTCustomer
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTCstomerlocalization
ExtLTCstomerlocalization, ExtLTCustomer union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomer
ExtLTCustomer keyGenerate(output(PK_Cliente as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCustomer
UnionCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Codigo as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Codigo = {Cliente ID},
		Cliente_ID = {Cliente ID},
		Nombre,
		Apellido,
		Segmento,
		Pais,
		Ciudad,
		Estado,
		Region
	)) ~> AlmacenarCliente
